segments.advisor_message: So, as we start our discussion today, could you please share your specific financial objectives that you wish to focus on? This will help me understand your needs better and guide our conversation.
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, I was thinking. I really wanna save up for, like, a house and probably also, um, start a retirement fund? You know, just, like, maybe a few other things too, but those are the main ones.
